data_table.description: MESA Eye Ancillary Study Dataset: This dataset provides eye refraction measures for MESA Classic participants.

variable.name: catr2
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TOLD BY A DOCTOR THAT YOU HAD A CATARACT IN EITHER EYE?
variable.comment: SUGGEST EXCLUDING DATA FROM THE EYE WITH THE CATARACT. EXCLUDE RIGHT EYE DATA IF CATR2=1 or 3 or 4. EXCLUDE LEFT EYE DATA IF CATR2=2 or 3 or 4. EXCLUDE DATA FROM BOTH EYES IF CATR2=3 OR 4.

variable.name: catrop2
variable.comment: EXCLUDE DATA WHERE AFFECTED EYE HAS HAD CATARACT SURGERY. EXCLUDE RIGHT EYE DATA IF CATROPA2=1 or 3 or 4.EXCLUDE LEFT EYE DATA IF CATROPA2=2 or 3 or 4. EXCLUDE DATA FROM BOTH EYES IF CATROPA2=3 OR 4.

variable.name: lassur2
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER HAD LASER VISION SURGERY/REFRACTIVE SURGERY?
variable.comment: EXCLUDE DATA IF THE EYE HAD REFRACTIVE SURGERY, LASSUR2=1. SEE RLASSUR2.

variable.name: rlassur2
variable.description: WHICH EYE HAD SURGERY TO IMPROVE DISTANCEVISION?
variable.comment: EXCLUDE DATA FROM THE EYE WITH REFRACTIVE SURGERY. EXCLUDE RIGHT EYE DATA IF RLASSUR2=1 or 3 or 9. EXCLUDE LEFT EYE DATA IF RLASSUR2=2 or 3 or 9. EXCLUDE DATA ON BOTH EYES IF RLASSUR2= 3 or 9.

variable.name: lensstat2
variable.description: WERE CONTACT LENSES WORN DURING VISION EXAM?
variable.comment: PARTICIPANTS WERE ASKED TO REMOVE THEIR EYEGLASSES BEFORE THE REFRACTION READINGS WERE TAKEN. RECOMMEND EXCLUDING DATA FOR A GIVEN EYE IF CONTACT LENSES WERE WORN. EXCLUDE LEFT EYE DATA IF LENSSTAT2=1 or 2 or 3 or 5 or 6. (IN OTHER WORDS, ONLY INCLUDE IF LENSSTAT2= 0 or 4 or 7) EXCLUDE RIGHT EYE DATA IF LENSTAT2=1 or 2 or 4 or 5 or 6. (IN OTHER WORDS, ONLY INCLUDE IF LENSSTAT2=0 or 3 or 7).

variable.name: lexclude2
variable.comment: Flag variable to exclude left eyes with cataract, cataract surgery, laser refractive surgery, or contact lenses worn for exam - as recommended above.

variable.name: rexclude2
variable.comment: Flag variable to exclude right eyes with cataract, cataract surgery, laser refractive surgery, or contact lenses worn for exam - as recommended above.

variable.name: bexclude2
variable.comment: Flag variable to exclude both eyes with cataract, cataract surgery, laser refractive surgery, or contact lenses worn for exam - as recommended above.

variable.name: leyesa2
variable.description: AVERAGE SPHERICAL DIOPTER VALUE LEFT EYE
variable.comment: MEASUREMENTS WERE TAKEN WITH NIDEK ARK760A, WITHOUT PHARMACOLOGIC MYDRIASIS. MEAN OF AT LEAST THREE MEASUREMENTS PER EYE. NOTE: SPHERE AND CYLINDER VALUES ARE NEEDED TO DERIVE SPHERICAL EQUIVALENT.

variable.name: reyesa2
variable.description: AVERAGE SPHERICAL DIOPTER VALUE RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: MEASUREMENTS WERE TAKEN WITH NIDEK ARK760A , WITHOUT PHARMACOLOGIC MYDRIASIS. MEAN OF AT LEAST THREE MEASUREMENTS PER EYE. NOTE: SPHERE AND CYLINDER VALUES ARE NEEDED TO DERIVE SPHERICAL EQUIVALENT.

variable.name: leyeca2
variable.description: AVERAGE CYLINDER DIOPTER VALUE LEFT EYE
variable.comment: RECORDED IN + CYLINDER NOTATION NOTE: SPHERE AND CYLINDER VALUES ARE NEEDED TO DERIVE SPHERICAL EQUIVALENT.

variable.name: reyeca2
variable.description: AVERAGE CYLINDER DIOPTER VALUE RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: RECORDED IN + CYLINDER NOTATION NOTE: SPHERE AND CYLINDER VALUES ARE NEEDED TO DERIVE SPHERICAL EQUIVALENT.
